cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4374, Broadband Internet Connections for Rural America Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 120 (Friday, July 9, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DAVID SCOTT of Georgia:
H.R. 4374.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
U.S Const. art. I, Sec.  8. cl. 3 and cl. 18
[Page H3617]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 466.

title: Broadband Internet Connections for Rural America Act
